column4: Hi, I'm having trouble mounting my USB-HDD on my girlfriends laptop
it mounts on my PC, and on her laptop on Winduws 7
there's no error message, nothing  happens :\ lsusb can see it, fdisk -l cannot
/var/log/messages (grepped) says "usbcore: registered new interface driver usb-storage"
also, ls /dev/sd* (after you plug it in)
i think it's being recognized as something other than a disk , paste lsusb
kk, will look at that now thanks!
no joy there on that forum post :(
SATA link down that's some spooky stuff
haha, maybe that's related to me doing the command "partprobe" as it said in that forum post, not sure...
